extracted_playbook.title: Contact Siemens Customer Support
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Siemens customer support to receive patch and update information for RUGGEDCOM APE1808.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Access to Management Interface
extracted_playbook.description: Reduce exposure by limiting access to the management interface to trusted internal IP addresses as described in Palo Alto Networks' Security Advisory.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and operate devices in a protected IT environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets as detailed in CISA's guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's guidance on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
